source_text: The Thunderstorm Gold Project comprises six granted exploration licenses (E28/2528, E28/2529, E28/2595, E28/3219, E28/3240 and E28/3384) for a total area of 348 km².
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Thunderstorm Gold Project and was converted from 348 km² to hectares (1 km² = 100 ha).
